description: Sustainable Operations is not only about greening your operations and leaning your operations but it is beginning with the design of the environment in mind right from the get-go. In this course, you will learn how to create a lean and green enterprise and look at operations from a strategic level. Covering topics like the Toyota Way, Cradle-to-Cradle design and Biomimicry, you can learn how to save your company a lot of money and make your operations sustainable at the same time.
title: Sustainable Operations
